ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] ...but it's still easier than playing a rogue
ygData.msgSnippet: You should be able to get woven in the swamp and solo at 10th.  All the frogloks drop woven or mesh of some sort pretty often. Kit ... From: Webber, Jessica
ygData.messageBody:
You should be able to get woven in the swamp and solo at 10th. All the
frogloks drop woven or mesh of some sort pretty often.

Kit

-----Original Message-----
From: Webber, Jessica [mailto:webber@...]
Sent: Wednesday, May 17, 2000 12:20 PM
To: 'eqbards@egroups.com'
Subject: RE: [eqbards] ...but it's still easier than playing a rogue


> From: Perhaps a Princess... [mailto:sarah@...]

> The hard part is finding someone selling :(

That's what I was thinking. So next question, where do you get them?
Froglok's I'm figuring. But can I get them in the swap (one of the few
zones left that I really want to see someday) or do I have to go into one of
the Guks? I'll settle for woven or mesh if I can't get them solo at level
10 or 11.

Thanks for all the info!

Evulia, bard of 11 missed notes, barely
